metadata.source: the text appended to P.L. Vaidya's edition of the Avadanasataka (Darbhanga 1958, Buddhist Sanskrit Texts ; 19)

children.text: na tv etair hi vinā vipraḥ
śucau tasmin vāṇī vrajati vikṛtaṃ naiva ca tanuḥ
dayālur viśvāsyo bhavati jagatāṃ bāndhava iva
na kopāgniś citte jvalayati hi dayātoyaśiśire
saṃkṣepeṇa dayāmataḥ sthiratayā paśyanti dharmaṃ budhāḥ
ko nāmāsti guṇaḥ sa sādhudayito yo nānuyāto dayām*
tasmāt putra ivātmanīva ca dayāṃ nītvā prakarṣaṃ jane
sanmaitryā viharanta eva muditāṃ prodbhāvayadhvaṃ sadā
ye maitrībhāvadharmaṃ kalimatiharaṇaṃ tat subhūteś caritraṃ
yātāḥ saukhāvatīṃ te 'py amitarucimuner dharmam ārādhayanti
